Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 77th overall pick, by Los Angeles (A) in 2012...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Minnesota on 5/30/2012 (Going to LAA: LF T. Colvin. Going to MIN: LF R. Willits, P I. West, SS T. Story, RF K. Copeland)...
Injured on 7/23/2014 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/14/2017, off Walter Johnson Jr. (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/17/2017, off Wade LeBlanc (TOR)...
Traded from Minnesota to St. Louis on 1/31/2018 (Going to STL: CF K. Copeland, SS W. Smith. Going to MIN: P M. Montgomery)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/23/2019, hitting .542 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
